full_description:
Cooler Master GM238-FFS 23.8" 0.5ms 144Hz FHD IPS Gaming Monitor

The Cooler Master GM238-FFS is a 23.8" FHD monitor with an UltraSpeed IPS 144Hz display. It has Dynamic Overdrive, Adaptive Sync, and 90% DCI-P3 coverage. This monitor is the next best thing to add to your work-and-play setup since it is straightforward and concentrates on the functions that are most important for productivity, gaming, and content production. The Cooler Master GM238-FFS Gaming Monitor's 23.8" Full HD 144Hz display and 90% DCI-P3 broad color gamut make it an exceptionally flexible monitor. With features that are crucial for both productivity and gaming, you may be free to concentrate on your business during the day and play your games without interruption at night. Cooler Master Gaming Monitor has the newest Ultra-Speed IPS screen, which makes it up to 4 times faster than conventional IPS displays. The picture is incredibly fluid with far less motion blur or smearing since the pixels change colors and scenes more quickly. Additionally designed with the Cooler Master GM238-FFS 23.8-inch FHD IPS Gaming Monitor in mind, Dynamic Overdrive automatically determines the best overdrive settings based on refresh rate to provide an even smoother experience. Smoother gaming that faithfully replicates a degree of realism in everything you play is provided via adaptive sync. You can enjoy smoother gameplay than ever by matching the output frames from your GPU to the refresh rate of the display. The GM238-FFS can faithfully replicate the colors in your games and entertainment that the designers intended for you to view, covering 90% of the DCI-P3 color range and 120% sRGB. With its Full HD resolution and 92.6 pixels-per-inch (PPI) for a 23.8-inch monitor, the GM238-FFS provides an excellent mix of performance and visual fidelity. Create as many as five distinct color profiles to suit various use scenarios. While you would like the blacks in an RPG or a movie to stay darker for more immersion, you might want to boost the Black Level Stabilization in first-person shooter games to make adversaries easier to spot in the dark. You have the option to customize five distinct profile settings to fit any scenario you could find yourself in. Use our Low Blue Light Mode to shield your eyes from potentially hazardous blue light. Additionally, our monitors are flicker-free, which lessens eye strain and frees up more time for work or gaming. The Cooler Master GM238-FFS 23.8" FHD Gaming Monitor has an elegant, minimalistic appearance. You can use this monitor as part of a professional setup or easily integrate it into your gaming setup because it doesn't have any fancy branding or giant logos whatsoever. With two DisplayPort 1.4 connectors and two HDMI 2.0 ports, you may connect a wide range of devices to your monitor.
